      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backward()
      Normalizes the backward movement (in the code) of the motor when orientation is reversed
      void forward()
      Normalizes the forward movement (in the code) of the motor when orientation is reversed

      Normalizes the tachometer count of the motor when orientation is reversed
      void rotate(int angle)
      Normalizes the angle of rotation of the motor when orientation is reversed
      void rotate(int angle, boolean immediateReturn)
      Normalizes the forward movement of the motor when orientation is reversed and immediate return is desired
